job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Are you looking for new challenges or to make a career move to build on your software engineering skills Do you have the technical chops to dig in deep into technical platform and integration technologies Do you want to have deep engagement with enterprise customers and directly observe the impact of your work Are you jazzed by the idea of integrating multiple MS technologies into highly strategic customer focused scenarios Are you interested in using your design coding troubleshooting skills to have an impact on design best practicesbrbrIf you answered Yes to these questions the WWL Engineering team is for you and we would love to have join usbrbrstrongWhat we dostrong  Within Worldwide Learning we seek to empower learners around the world to acquire the skills enabling them to get a job advance in their career and achieve more Here is an opportunity for you to influence our learning programs and experiences designed to build world class capability for customers partners employees and future generations We reach millions of learners where they are anytime anywhere and deliver experiences that support exploring learning practicing and proving their skillsbrbrWe use Microsoft Business Applications Dynamics 365 Power platform and Microsofts technical stack to augment and enhance our ability to support learners throughout their learning journey across the diversity of our program offeringsbrbrWe are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help design develop and deliver reusable enterprise scenarios leveraging Business Applications amp Power Platform which comprises of Dynamics 365 LogicApps PowerApps Flow CDS Power Automate and xRM We are looking for a person who combines passion for customer technical aptitude is a team playerbrbrAs a Senior Software Engineer you will be responsible for designing configuring implementing the business requirements and features leveraging Dynamics 365 products that enable our mission critical business partners This is a datadriven and fast paced environment  where Engineers are empowered to innovate and take ideas from conception to scale It is a great opportunity to work on something highly strategic to Microsoft especially since Business Applications is Microsofts next billiondollar business and we at WWL Engineering work closely with RampD team to drive feedback into the product through internal implementations solving complex business problemsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongIn this role youll collaborate with crossdiscipline teams to solve complex business challenges using the Dynamics 365 and Power Platform to enable successful delivery of our skilling programs and initiatives You will also be expected to demonstrate ability to learn and adopt relevant new technologies tools methods and processes from Microsoft and industry You will use every opportunity to build features to be reusable across multiple solutions as well as leverage features from others in your solutionsbrbrstronguMore Specifically You WillbrustrongulliBuild frontend web solutions on top of Dynamics 365 and the Power Platform PowerApps PowerBI FlowliliArchitect platform capabilities keeping reusability scalability and adoption in mindliliDrive design requirements engineering scrum execution and technical discussionsliliDetail design of the E2E solution Utilize reference architecture in project design workliliDemonstrate engineering excellence through commitment to quality execution continued improvement and customer empathyliliMentor and act as a role model for junior developersliliContribute to a team culture that embraces diversity and inclusionbrbrliulTo be successful in this role you must have strong verbal and written communication skills a positive attitude and the creativity to tackle hard ambiguous problems in innovate ways You also thrive in a team environment that values crossteam collaboration and building on the success of othersbrbrstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliBS degree in Computer Science or equivalent experienceeducationlili7 years of professional software developmentlili4 years of experience building great UIUX for the web using HTML5 CSS3 JavaScriptjQueryTypeScript  ASPNET REST or SQLlili3 years development experience with CbrbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience developing responsive web applicationsliliExperience delivering enterprise solutions and deploymentsliliAbility to work in a team environment that promotes collaborationliliExceptional problem solving technical and data analysis skillsliliPassion for quality with strong customer empathy and focusliliExperience building integrating or customizing Dynamics 365 applications or other CRM software packages Salesforce SAP etcliliKnowledge of Azure stack and surround technologiesliliKnowledge of Dynamics 365 CE FampO PowerApps Power Automate Common Data Service and Power BIliliExperience with ReactJS or React NativeliliExperience with Accessibility Standards WCAG 20brbrliulMicrosoft is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex including pregnancy sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws regulations and ordinances We also consider qualified
